name: Race Redemption
description:
Back in the 70's you were the top dog in Formula 1 racing, no one could mach your speed,  agility and pure focus. Sadly as the decade came to an end so did your racing career with a horrible crash, not on the track but in your personal life.  The years of fast living on an off the track had taken its toll on you.  A series of losses, drug abuse and sex scandals and  getting old had made you the laughing stock of the F1 world.  

You had given the sport up for good, until one afternoon in 1983 drinking in a dirty bar you saw your arch rival Materious Miix giving an interview stating that even in your prime, you would not be able to beat him now. 

Enraged by this you decided to get back in, spending your every last dollar just to be allowed to drive for the smallest team currently in the championship. You were going out with a bang, not a whimper. 

Early Atari style racing game, made in Gamemaker. Beat my high score to win the game.  WASD controlles the car, arrow left and right tilts it. Leave a comment bellow if you enjoyed it, hated it or it made you aroused. 

The code  and assets are free to use by anyone for anything.

The music is made by Rolemusic at: 

https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Rolemusic/The_Black_Dot
or
http://rolemusic.sawsquarenoise.com/
